amendment.description: To extend the current-law pay-as-you-go requirement.

action.text: Amendment SA 835 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 835 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 200.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 835.
Amendment SA 835 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S7101-7106; text: CR S7101-7102) To extend the current-law pay-as-you-go requirement.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 835 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 200.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 835 proposed by Senator Feingold.
